title: Pixel 2 makes buzzing sound when using bluetooth headphones
content:
The buzzing sound:
- is low-volume and can be heard during quiet passages of music or between tracks
- goes on and off in the same way a blinking light goes on and off, with a random pattern
- can be heard on different headphones
- is intermittent
- is heard when using Spotify and Doubletwist with Bluetooth headphones
- is NOT heard when using Chromecast Audio
